00047 static std::deque<shared_ptr<XStatusPrinter> > s_statusPrinterCreating;
00048 static std::deque<shared_ptr<XQConnector> > s_conCreating;
00049 static std::map<const QWidget*, weak_ptr<XNode> > s_widgetMap;
00050 
00051 void _sharedPtrQDeleter(QObject *obj) {
00052     if(isMainThread())
00053         delete obj;
00054     else
00055         obj->deleteLater();
00056 }
00057 
00058 _XQConnectorHolder::_XQConnectorHolder(XQConnector *con) :
00059     QObject(0L) {
00060     m_connector = s_conCreating.back();
00061     s_conCreating.pop_back();
00062     connect(con->m_pWidget, SIGNAL( destroyed() ), this, SLOT( destroyed() ) );
00063     ASSERT(con->shared_from_this());
00064 }
00065 _XQConnectorHolder::~_XQConnectorHolder() {
00066     if(m_connector)
00067         disconnect(m_connector->m_pWidget, SIGNAL( destroyed() ), this, SLOT( destroyed() ) );
00068 }
00069 bool
00070 _XQConnectorHolder::isAlive() const {
00071     return m_connector;
00072 }
00073 
00074 void
00075 _XQConnectorHolder::destroyed () {
00076     disconnect(m_connector->m_pWidget, SIGNAL( destroyed() ), this, SLOT( destroyed() ) );
00077     std::map<const QWidget*, weak_ptr<XNode> >::iterator it = s_widgetMap.find(m_connector->m_pWidget);
00078     ASSERT(it != s_widgetMap.end());
00079     s_widgetMap.erase(it);
00080     m_connector->m_pWidget = 0L;
00081     m_connector.reset();
00082 }
00083 
00084 XQConnector::XQConnector(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node, QWidget *item)
00085     : QObject(),
00086       m_pWidget(item) 
00087 {
00088     ASSERT(node);
00089     ASSERT(item);
00090     s_conCreating.push_back(shared_ptr<XQConnector>(this));
00091     m_lsnUIEnabled = node->onUIEnabled().connectWeak
00092         (shared_from_this(), &XQConnector::onUIEnabled,
00093          XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL | XListener::FLAG_AVOID_DUP);
00094     onUIEnabled(node);
00095     dbgPrint(QString("connector %1 created., addr=0x%2, size=0x%3")
00096              .arg(node->getName())
00097              .arg((uintptr_t)this, 0, 16)
00098              .arg((uintptr_t)sizeof(XQConnector), 0, 16));
00099     
00100     std::pair<std::map<const QWidget*, weak_ptr<XNode> >::iterator, bool> ret = 
00101         s_widgetMap.insert(std::pair<const QWidget*, weak_ptr<XNode> >(item, node));
00102     if(!ret.second)
00103         gErrPrint("Connection to Widget Duplicated!");
00104 #ifdef HAVE_LIBGCCPP
00105     GC_gcollect();
00106 #endif
00107 }
00108 XQConnector::~XQConnector() {
00109     if(isItemAlive()) {
00110         m_pWidget->setEnabled(false);
00111         dbgPrint(QString("connector %1 released., addr=0x%2").arg(objectName()).arg((uintptr_t)this, 0, 16));
00112         std::map<const QWidget*, weak_ptr<XNode> >::iterator it = s_widgetMap.find(m_pWidget);
00113         ASSERT(it != s_widgetMap.end());
00114         s_widgetMap.erase(it);
00115     }
00116     else {
00117         dbgPrint(QString("connector %1 & widget released., addr=0x%2").arg(objectName()).arg((uintptr_t)this, 0, 16));
00118     }
00119 
00120 #ifdef HAVE_LIBGCCPP
00121     GC_gcollect();
00122 #endif
00123 }
00124 shared_ptr<XNode>
00125 XQConnector::connectedNode(const QWidget *item) {
00126     std::map<const QWidget*, weak_ptr<XNode> >::iterator it = s_widgetMap.find(item);
00127     if(it == s_widgetMap.end())
00128         return shared_ptr<XNode>();
00129     return it->second.lock();
00130 }

00133 XQConnector::onUIEnabled(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node) {
00134     m_pWidget->setEnabled(node->isUIEnabled());
00135 }

00167 XQLineEditConnector::XQLineEditConnector(
00168     const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &node, QLineEdit *item, bool forcereturn)
00169     : XValueQConnector(node, item),
00170       m_node(node), m_pItem(item) {
00171     connect(item, SIGNAL( returnPressed() ), this, SLOT( onReturnPressed() ) );
00172     connect(item, SIGNAL( lostFocus() ), this, SLOT( onExit() ) );
00173     if(forcereturn) {
00174         connect(item, SIGNAL( textChanged( const QString &) ),
00175                 this, SLOT( onTextChanged(const QString &) ) );
00176     }
00177     else {
00178         connect(item, SIGNAL( textChanged( const QString &) ),
00179                 this, SLOT( onTextChanged2(const QString &) ) );
00180     }
00181     onValueChanged(node);
00182 }
00183 void
00184 XQLineEditConnector::onTextChanged(const QString &text) {
00185     QPalette palette(m_pItem->palette());
00186     palette.setColor(QPalette::Text, Qt::blue);
00187     m_pItem->setPalette(palette);
00188 }
00189 void
00190 XQLineEditConnector::onTextChanged2(const QString &text) {
00191     QPalette palette(m_pItem->palette());
00192     m_lsnValueChanged->mask();
00193     try {
00194         m_node->str(text);
00195         palette.setColor(QPalette::Text, Qt::black);
00196     }
00197     catch (XKameError &e) {
00198         palette.setColor(QPalette::Text, Qt::red);
00199     }
00200     m_lsnValueChanged->unmask();
00201     m_pItem->setPalette(palette);
00202 }
00203 void
00204 XQLineEditConnector::onReturnPressed() {
00205     QPalette palette(m_pItem->palette());
00206     try {
00207         m_node->str(m_pItem->text());
00208         palette.setColor(QPalette::Text, Qt::black);
00209     }
00210     catch (XKameError &e) {
00211         e.print();
00212         palette.setColor(QPalette::Text, Qt::red);
00213     }
00214     m_pItem->setPalette(palette);
00215 }
00216 void
00217 XQLineEditConnector::onExit() {
00218     QPalette palette(m_pItem->palette());
00219     palette.setColor(QPalette::Text, Qt::black);
00220     m_pItem->setPalette(palette);
00221     if(QString(m_node->to_str()) != m_pItem->text()) {
00222         m_pItem->blockSignals(true);
00223         m_pItem->setText(m_node->to_str());
00224         m_pItem->blockSignals(false);
00225         shared_ptr<XStatusPrinter> statusprinter = g_statusPrinter;
00226         if(statusprinter) statusprinter->printMessage(i18n("Input canceled."));
00227     }
00228 }
00229 void
00230 XQLineEditConnector::onValueChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &node) {
00231     m_pItem->blockSignals(true);
00232     m_pItem->setText(node->to_str());
00233     m_pItem->blockSignals(false);
00234 }

00236 XQSpinBoxConnector::XQSpinBoxConnector(const shared_ptr<XIntNode> &node,
00237     QSpinBox *item, QSlider *slider)
00238     : XValueQConnector(node, item),
00239       m_iNode(node),
00240       m_uINode(),
00241       m_pItem(item),
00242       m_pSlider(slider)
00243 {
00244     connect(item, SIGNAL( valueChanged(int) ), this, SLOT( onChange(int) ) );
00245     onValueChanged(node);
00246 }
00247 XQSpinBoxConnector::XQSpinBoxConnector(const shared_ptr<XUIntNode> &node,
00248     QSpinBox *item, QSlider *slider)
00249     : XValueQConnector(node, item),
00250       m_iNode(),
00251       m_uINode(node),
00252       m_pItem(item),
00253       m_pSlider(slider)
00254 {
00255     connect(item, SIGNAL( valueChanged(int) ), this, SLOT( onChange(int) ) );
00256     if(slider) {
00257         connect(slider, SIGNAL( valueChanged(int) ), this, SLOT( onChange(int) ) );
00258         slider->setRange(item->minimum(), item->maximum());
00259         slider->setSingleStep(item->singleStep());
00260     }
00261     onValueChanged(node);
00262 }
00263 void
00264 XQSpinBoxConnector::onChange(int val) {
00265     m_lsnValueChanged->mask();
00266     if(m_iNode) {
00267         m_iNode->value(val);
00268     }
00269     if(m_uINode) {
00270         m_uINode->value(val);
00271     }
00272     m_lsnValueChanged->unmask();
00273 }
00274 void
00275 XQSpinBoxConnector::onValueChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &node) {
00276     m_pItem->blockSignals(true);
00277     m_pItem->setValue(QString(node->to_str()).toInt());
00278     m_pItem->blockSignals(false);
00279     if(m_pSlider) {
00280         m_pSlider->blockSignals(true);
00281         m_pSlider->setValue(QString(node->to_str()).toInt());
00282         m_pSlider->blockSignals(false);
00283     }
00284 }

00387 void
00388 XQLCDNumberConnector::onValueChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) {
00389     QString buf(m_node->to_str());
00390     if((int)buf.length() > m_pItem->numDigits())
00391         m_pItem->setNumDigits(buf.length());
00392     m_pItem->display(buf);

00423 XListQConnector::XListQConnector(const shared_ptr<XListNodeBase> &node, Q3Table *item)
00424     : XQConnector(node, item),
00425       m_pItem(item), m_list(node) {
00426     m_lsnMove = node->onMove().connectWeak
00427         (shared_from_this(),
00428          &XListQConnector::onMove, XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL);
00429     m_lsnCatch = node->onCatch().connectWeak
00430         (shared_from_this(), &XListQConnector::onCatch, XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL);
00431     m_lsnRelease = node->onRelease().connectWeak
00432         (shared_from_this(), &XListQConnector::onRelease, XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL);
00433     m_pItem->setReadOnly(true);
00434 
00435     m_pItem->setSelectionMode(Q3Table::SingleRow);
00436 
00437     m_pItem->setRowMovingEnabled(true);
00438     Q3Header *header = m_pItem->verticalHeader();
00439     header->setResizeEnabled(false);
00440     header->setMovingEnabled(true);
00441     connect(header, SIGNAL( indexChange(int, int, int)),
00442             this, SLOT( indexChange(int, int, int)));    
00443     header->setToolTip(i18n("Use drag-n-drop with ctrl pressed to reorder."));
00444 }
00445 XListQConnector::~XListQConnector() {
00446     if(isItemAlive()) {
00447         disconnect(m_pItem, NULL, this, NULL );
00448         m_pItem->setNumRows(0);
00449     }
00450 }
00451 void
00452 XListQConnector::indexChange ( int section, int fromIndex, int toIndex )
00453 {
00454     unsigned int src = fromIndex;
00455     unsigned int dst = toIndex;
00456     
00457     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> list(m_list->children());
00458     if(!list || src > list->size() || (dst > list->size())) {
00459         throw XKameError(i18n("Invalid range of selections."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00460     }
00461     m_lsnMove->mask();
00462     m_list->move(src, dst);
00463     m_lsnMove->unmask();
00464 }
00465 void
00466 XListQConnector::onMove(const XListNodeBase::MoveEvent &e)
00467 {
00468     int dir = (e.src_idx - e.dst_idx) ? 1 : -1;
00469     for(unsigned int idx = e.dst_idx; idx != e.src_idx; idx += dir) {
00470         m_pItem->swapRows(idx, idx + dir);
00471     }
00472     m_pItem->updateContents();
00473 }

00476     : XValueQConnector(node, item) {
00477     m_lsnListChanged = node->onListChanged().connectWeak
00478         (shared_from_this(), &XItemQConnector::onListChanged,
00479          XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL | XListener::FLAG_AVOID_DUP);
00480 }
00481 XItemQConnector::~XItemQConnector() {
00482 }

00484 XQComboBoxConnector::XQComboBoxConnector(const shared_ptr<XItemNodeBase> &node,
00485                                          QComboBox *item)
00486     : XItemQConnector(node, item),
00487       m_node(node), m_pItem(item) {
00488     connect(item, SIGNAL( activated(int) ), this, SLOT( onSelect(int) ) );
00489     onListChanged(node);
00490 }
00491 void
00492 XQComboBoxConnector::onSelect(int idx) {
00493     try {
00494         if(!m_itemStrings || (idx >= m_itemStrings->size()) || (idx < 0))
00495             m_node->str(XString());
00496         else
00497             m_node->str(m_itemStrings->at(idx).name);
00498     }
00499     catch (XKameError &e) {
00500         e.print();
00501     }
00502 }
00503 
00504 int
00505 XQComboBoxConnector::findItem(const QString &text) {
00506     for(int i = 0; i < m_pItem->count(); i++) {
00507         if(text == m_pItem->itemText(i)) {
00508             return i;
00509         }
00510     }
00511     return -1;
00512 }
00513 
00514 void
00515 XQComboBoxConnector::onValueChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) {
00516     m_pItem->blockSignals(true);
00517     QString str = m_node->to_str();
00518     int idx = -1;
00519     int i = 0;
00520     for(std::deque<XItemNodeBase::Item>::const_iterator it = m_itemStrings->begin();
00521         it != m_itemStrings->end(); it++) {
00522         if(QString(it->name) == str) {
00523             idx = i;
00524         }
00525         i++;
00526     }
00527     if(idx >= 0) {
00528         m_pItem->setCurrentIndex(idx);
00529         if(m_node->autoSetAny()) {
00530             int idx1 = findItem(i18n("(UNSEL)"));
00531             if(idx1 >= 0) {
00532                 m_pItem->removeItem(idx1);
00533             }
00534         }
00535     }
00536     else {
00537         if(m_node->autoSetAny()) {
00538             int idx = findItem(i18n("(UNSEL)"));
00539             if(idx < 0) {
00540                 m_pItem->addItem(i18n("(UNSEL)"));
00541             }
00542         }
00543         int idx = findItem(i18n("(UNSEL)"));
00544         ASSERT(idx >= 0);
00545         m_pItem->setCurrentIndex(idx);
00546     }
00547     m_pItem->blockSignals(false);
00548 }
00549 void
00550 XQComboBoxConnector::onListChanged(const shared_ptr<XItemNodeBase> &)
00551 {
00552     m_itemStrings = m_node->itemStrings();
00553     m_pItem->clear();
00554     bool exist = false;
00555     for(std::deque<XItemNodeBase::Item>::const_iterator it = m_itemStrings->begin(); 
00556         it != m_itemStrings->end(); it++) {
00557         if(it->label.empty()) {
00558             m_pItem->addItem(i18n("(NO NAME)"));
00559         }
00560         else {
00561             m_pItem->addItem(QString(it->label));
00562             exist = true;
00563         }
00564     }
00565     if(!m_node->autoSetAny())
00566         m_pItem->addItem(i18n("(UNSEL)"));
00567     onValueChanged(m_node);
00568 }
00569 
00570 XQListBoxConnector::XQListBoxConnector(const shared_ptr<XItemNodeBase> &node, Q3ListBox *item)
00571     : XItemQConnector(node, item),
00572       m_node(node), m_pItem(item) {
00573     connect(item, SIGNAL(highlighted(int) ), this, SLOT( onSelect(int) ) );
00574     connect(item, SIGNAL(selected(int) ), this, SLOT( onSelect(int) ) );
00575     onListChanged(node);
00576 }
00577 void
00578 XQListBoxConnector::onSelect(int idx) {
00579     try {
00580         if(!m_itemStrings || (idx >= m_itemStrings->size()) || (idx < 0))
00581             m_node->str(XString());
00582         else
00583             m_node->str(m_itemStrings->at(idx).name);
00584     }
00585     catch (XKameError &e) {
00586         e.print();
00587     }
00588 }
00589 void
00590 XQListBoxConnector::onValueChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) {
00591     QString str = m_node->to_str();
00592     m_pItem->blockSignals(true);
00593     unsigned int i = 0;
00594     for(std::deque<XItemNodeBase::Item>::const_iterator it = m_itemStrings->begin(); 
00595         it != m_itemStrings->end(); it++) {
00596         if(str == QString(it->name))
00597             m_pItem->setCurrentItem(i);
00598         i++;
00599     }
00600     m_pItem->blockSignals(false);
00601 }
00602 void
00603 XQListBoxConnector::onListChanged(const shared_ptr<XItemNodeBase> &)
00604 {
00605     m_itemStrings = m_node->itemStrings();
00606     m_pItem->clear();
00607     for(std::deque<XItemNodeBase::Item>::const_iterator it = m_itemStrings->begin(); 
00608         it != m_itemStrings->end(); it++) {
00609         m_pItem->insertItem(it->label);
00610     }
00611     onValueChanged(m_node);
00612 }

00616       m_node(node), m_pItem(item) {
00617     connect(item, SIGNAL( changed(const QColor &) ), this, SLOT( onClick(const QColor &) ) );
00618     onValueChanged(node);
00619 }
00620 void
00621 XKColorButtonConnector::onClick(const QColor &newColor) {
00622     m_node->value(newColor.rgb());
00623 }
00624 void
00625 XKColorButtonConnector::onValueChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &) {
00626     m_pItem->setColor(QColor((QRgb)(unsigned int)*m_node));
00627 }

00643 
00644 XStatusPrinter::XStatusPrinter(QMainWindow *window)
00645 {
00646     if(!window) window = dynamic_cast<QMainWindow*>(g_pFrmMain);
00647     m_pWindow = (window);
00648     m_pBar = (window->statusBar());
00649     m_pPopup  = (new KPassivePopup( window ));
00650     s_statusPrinterCreating.push_back(shared_ptr<XStatusPrinter>(this));
00651     m_pBar->hide();
00652     m_lsn = m_tlkTalker.connectWeak(
00653         shared_from_this(), &XStatusPrinter::print,
00654         XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL | XListener::FLAG_AVOID_DUP);
00655 }
00656 XStatusPrinter::~XStatusPrinter() {
00657 }
00658 shared_ptr<XStatusPrinter>
00659 XStatusPrinter::create(QMainWindow *window)
00660 {
00661     new XStatusPrinter(window);
00662     shared_ptr<XStatusPrinter> ptr = s_statusPrinterCreating.back();
00663     s_statusPrinterCreating.pop_back();
00664     return ptr;
00665 }
00666 void
00667 XStatusPrinter::printMessage(const XString &str, bool popup) {
00668     tstatus status;
00669     status.ms = 3000;
00670     status.str = str;
00671     status.popup = popup;
00672     status.type = tstatus::Normal;
00673     m_tlkTalker.talk(status);
00674 }
00675 void
00676 XStatusPrinter::printWarning(const XString &str, bool popup) {
00677     tstatus status;
00678     status.ms = 3000;
00679     status.str = XString(i18n("Warning: ")) + str;
00680     status.popup = popup;
00681     status.type = tstatus::Warning;
00682     m_tlkTalker.talk(status);
00683 }
00684 void
00685 XStatusPrinter::printError(const XString &str, bool popup) {
00686     tstatus status;
00687     status.ms = 5000;
00688     status.str = XString(i18n("Error: ")) + str;
00689     status.popup = popup;
00690     status.type = tstatus::Error;
00691     m_tlkTalker.talk(status);
00692 }
00693 void
00694 XStatusPrinter::clear(void) {
00695     tstatus status;
00696     status.ms = 0;
00697     status.str = "";
00698     m_tlkTalker.talk(status);
00699 }
00700 
00701 void
00702 XStatusPrinter::print(const tstatus &status) {
00703     bool popup = status.popup;
00704     QString str = status.str;
00705     if(status.ms) {
00706         m_pBar->show();
00707         m_pBar->showMessage(str, status.ms);
00708     }
00709     else {
00710         m_pBar->hide();
00711         m_pBar->clearMessage();
00712     }
00713     if(status.ms && popup) {
00714         m_pPopup->hide();
00715         m_pPopup->setTimeout(status.ms);
00716         QPixmap *icon;
00717         switch(status.type) {
00718         case tstatus::Normal:
00719             icon = g_pIconInfo;
00720             break;
00721         case tstatus::Warning:
00722             icon = g_pIconWarn;
00723             break;
00724         case tstatus::Error:
00725             icon = g_pIconError;
00726             break;
00727         }
00728         m_pPopup->setView(m_pWindow->windowTitle(), str, *icon );
00729         m_pPopup->show();
00730     }
00731     else {
00732         m_pPopup->hide();
00733     }
00734 }
